bwwExcerpt: "This sequel to Burton’s 1988 cracked pop masterpiece Beetlejuice doesn’t strive for greatness, or even your garden-variety over-the-top fantastical vision. rejectionReasoning: claude: This review is about the movie 'Beetlejuice Beetlejuice', not a Broadway show; kimi: This excerpt is a review of the 2024 film 'Beetlejuice Beetlejuice' (directed by Tim Burton), not the Broadway musical. The text explicitly refers to the movie sequel to the 1988 film.
